byline.original: By LAWRENCE K. ALTMAN and NICHOLAS WADE
byline.contributor: Christina Anderson contributed reporting from Stockholm, and Maria V. Elkin from Washington.

snippet: The Nobel Prize committee said it would stick with its decision to award a Nobel in medicine to Dr. Ralph M. Steinman for advances in immunology, even though he died on Friday.
lead_paragraph: The Nobel Prize committee said it would stick with its decision to award a Nobel in medicine to Dr. Ralph M. Steinman for advances in immunology, even though he died on Friday.

headline.main: One of 3 Chosen for Nobel in Medicine Died Days Ago
headline.print_headline: Death Doesn’t Rob Recipient Of Nobel Prize
